enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Stefan Rösner (Germany) outlined discussions in the contact group.
Chair Benrageb introduced draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.24) and a draft decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.24/Add.1) on how to best put the Global Climate Observing System plan into action.
Parties adopted the conclusions, and forwarded the draft decision to the COP for consideration, including a minor amendment.
